00029   ## \brief Returns the number of samples.
00030   #
00031   # \return 1 for static/dynamic models, number of samples otherwise
00032   def nrSamples(self):
00033     """
00034     Returns the number of samples
00035     """
00036     assert self._d_firstSampleNumber
00037     return self._d_lastSampleNumber - \
00038            self._d_firstSampleNumber + 1
00039 
00040 
00041   def currentSampleNumber(self):
00042     """
00043     Returns the current sample number
00044     """
00045     assert self._d_currentSampleNumber
00046     return self._d_currentSampleNumber
00047 
00048 
00049   def sampleNumbers(self):
00050     """
00051     Returns a list of sample numbers configured
00052     """
00053     assert self._d_firstSampleNumber
00054     return range(self._d_firstSampleNumber, \
00055            self._d_lastSampleNumber + 1)

00078   ## Sets the current sample number to nr.
00079   def _setCurrentSample(self, nr):
00080     assert nr >= self._firstSampleNumber()
00081     assert nr <= self._lastSampleNumber()
00082     self._d_currentSampleNumber = nr
